name: Trick-Crow, Shieldwing
effect:
While this card is in a Monster Zone or face-up in the Extra Deck it is treated as a Normal Monster 
(Winged Beast/WIND/Level 7/ATK 1900/ DEF 2600) (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.)

When a monster effect is activated on the field: target that monster, and negate it's effects while "Trick Crow, Shieldwing" is face-up on the field (even if this card leaves the field.), and if you do, Special Summon this card in face-up Defense Position as a Normal Monster. If summoned this way, this monster's original DEF becomes equal to the targeted monster's ATK while that monster is on the field
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.

pendulum.effect: If a Trick-Crow monster you control battles, your opponent cannot activate monster effects until the end of the Damage Step.
